emails.subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset
emails.body_text:
Thank you Saber for your help!

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 
Sent: Thursday, August 7, 2025 3:42 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello Enea,

 

As discussed kindly find below the link to the dataset on the verbio environment 

https://verbio.dnext.io/datasets/verbio-7547c66d-72ab-11f0-8b51-02abcd39fb87/data-exploration

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io <mailto:enea.albertoli@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Thursday, August 7, 2025 8:32
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

We have monthly data here we can use to make a monthly dataset, could you please use this data instead?

 

 

https://www.eia.gov/totalenergy/data/monthly/



 

From: Enea Albertoli 
Sent: Thursday, August 7, 2025 9:24 AM
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello Saber,

 

Thank you for the dataset.

However, the data source your are using is weekly. As pointed out in my previous email, we only make this dataset if we have monthly data, we do not make a monthly dataset from weekly data.

It seems that this dataset’s source is weekly data.

 

 

 

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Wednesday, August 6, 2025 3:57 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io <mailto:enea.albertoli@dnext.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello Enea,

 

The monthly data has been made available, and you can find the new dataset at the following link on DNEXR:

 

https://dnexr.dnext.io/datasets/dnexr-eia-petroleum-usa-snd-item-monthly

 

Could you please do a quick check to ensure everything looks good before we share it with the Verbio client?

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io <mailto:enea.albertoli@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Tuesday, August 5, 2025 15:08
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello Saber,

 

No if we have monthly data we show it as monthly, in a new dataset, meanwhile if we have weekly data, we show it as weekly. We do not need to estimate monthly from weekly though.

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Tuesday, August 5, 2025 3:47 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io <mailto:enea.albertoli@dnext.io> >; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello , 

 

Is there a file for monthly data or we just sum the values that are in the same month ?

also noticed in the source that some of the data is monthly and we are mapping the value period as “WEEK” for all the data

 



 



 

Also for the column adding we need to pass by the dev team for that the easiest way is to create a new dataset

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io <mailto:saber.khalfallah@dnext.io> 



 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io <mailto:info@dnext.io>  | www.dnext.io <http://www.dnext.io/> 

 

 

From: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io <mailto:enea.albertoli@dnext.io> > 
Sent: Tuesday, August 5, 2025 14:29
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io <mailto:support@dnext.io> >
Subject: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Dear Customer Support Team,

 

Verbio client is asking whether it is possible either to:

*	Add a column with the monthly data
*	Or, create a new dataset with monthly data

Whichever is easiest for you.

 

verbio-2dc32584-b3f3-4850-bec7-2ddb0e383be4

https://verbio.dnext.io/datasets/verbio-2dc32584-b3f3-4850-bec7-2ddb0e383be4/general

 

Do you think we may do this, please?

 

Best,

 

Enea
emails.body_html:
Thank you Saber for your help!

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Thursday, August 7, 2025 3:42 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello Enea,

 

As discussed kindly find below the link to the dataset on the verbio environment

https://verbio.dnext.io/datasets/verbio-7547c66d-72ab-11f0-8b51-02abcd39fb87/data-exploration

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>
Sent: Thursday, August 7, 2025 8:32
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

We have monthly data here we can use to make a monthly dataset, could you please use this data instead?

 

 

https://www.eia.gov/totalenergy/data/monthly/

 

From: Enea Albertoli
Sent: Thursday, August 7, 2025 9:24 AM
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello Saber,

 

Thank you for the dataset.

However, the data source your are using is weekly. As pointed out in my previous email, we only make this dataset if we have monthly data, we do not make a monthly dataset from weekly data.

It seems that this dataset’s source is weekly data.

 

 

 

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Wednesday, August 6, 2025 3:57 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello Enea,

 

The monthly data has been made available, and you can find the new dataset at the following link on DNEXR:

 

https://dnexr.dnext.io/datasets/dnexr-eia-petroleum-usa-snd-item-monthly

 

Could you please do a quick check to ensure everything looks good before we share it with the Verbio client?

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>
Sent: Tuesday, August 5, 2025 15:08
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello Saber,

 

No if we have monthly data we show it as monthly, in a new dataset, meanwhile if we have weekly data, we show it as weekly. We do not need to estimate monthly from weekly though.

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Tuesday, August 5, 2025 3:47 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello ,

 

Is there a file for monthly data or we just sum the values that are in the same month ?

also noticed in the source that some of the data is monthly and we are mapping the value period as “WEEK” for all the data

 

 

 

Also for the column adding we need to pass by the dev team for that the easiest way is to create a new dataset

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>
Sent: Tuesday, August 5, 2025 14:29
To: Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Dear Customer Support Team,

 

Verbio client is asking whether it is possible either to:

  • Add a column with the monthly data
  • Or, create a new dataset with monthly data

Whichever is easiest for you.

 

verbio-2dc32584-b3f3-4850-bec7-2ddb0e383be4

https://verbio.dnext.io/datasets/verbio-2dc32584-b3f3-4850-bec7-2ddb0e383be4/general

 

Do you think we may do this, please?

 

Best,

 

Enea

We have monthly data here we can use to make a monthly dataset, could you please use this data instead?

Sent: Thursday, August 7, 2025 9:24 AM
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello Saber,

 

Thank you for the dataset.

However, the data source your are using is weekly. As pointed out in my previous email, we only make this dataset if we have monthly data, we do not make a monthly dataset from weekly data.

It seems that this dataset’s source is weekly data.

 

 

 

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Wednesday, August 6, 2025 3:57 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello Enea,

 

The monthly data has been made available, and you can find the new dataset at the following link on DNEXR:

 

https://dnexr.dnext.io/datasets/dnexr-eia-petroleum-usa-snd-item-monthly

 

Could you please do a quick check to ensure everything looks good before we share it with the Verbio client?

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello ,

 

Is there a file for monthly data or we just sum the values that are in the same month ?

also noticed in the source that some of the data is monthly and we are mapping the value period as “WEEK” for all the data

 

 

 

Also for the column adding we need to pass by the dev team for that the easiest way is to create a new dataset

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

https://dnexr.dnext.io/datasets/dnexr-eia-petroleum-usa-snd-item-monthly

 

Could you please do a quick check to ensure everything looks good before we share it with the Verbio client?

 

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

                                                                                                     saber.khalfallah@dnext.io

 

 

DNEXT INTELLIGENCE SA | Avenue Louis-Casaï 81 | CH-1216 Cointrin

info@dnext.io | www.dnext.io

 

 

From: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>
Sent: Tuesday, August 5, 2025 15:08
To: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello Saber,

 

No if we have monthly data we show it as monthly, in a new dataset, meanwhile if we have weekly data, we show it as weekly. We do not need to estimate monthly from weekly though.

 

From: Saber Khalfallah <saber.khalfallah@dnext.io>
Sent: Tuesday, August 5, 2025 3:47 PM
To: Enea Albertoli <enea.albertoli@dnext.io>; Support Dnext <support@dnext.io>
Subject: RE: Addition of Monthly Column to Dataset

 

Hello ,

 

Is there a file for monthly data or we just sum the values that are in the same month ?

also noticed in the source that some of the data is monthly and we are mapping the value period as “WEEK” for all the data

 

 

 

Also for the column adding we need to pass by the dev team for that the easiest way is to create a new dataset

Best regards,

Saber Khalfallah

Customer Support

Hello Saber,

 

Thank you for the dataset.

It seems that this dataset’s source is weekly data.
